item.title: ET
item.description: score:-78 Chances: ET’s strong cash flow for 2024 is expected due to improved efficiency in working capital and profitability. Energy Transfer LP’s segment diversification and focus on natural gas, NGL, crude oil, and investment in Sunoco LP and USAC indicate potential for growth and stability in various market conditions.
